text:
Hey Richard , 
I seem to be having some issue with the notifications on my phone so I’m case you don’t hear from me within a couple of days of your message , just ping me again . I’m not sure what’s causing it but the notifications are inconsistent.

That’s great !! Good luck with the application 
In terms of tips I’d say clarity goes a long way in being taken seriously
What I mean is , if your cv demonstrates clarity in thinking wrt the kind of work you would like to do , that increases your odds of getting picked .
But In your case , I’m guessing you are applying for the role of a compositor so there’s probably not a lot of scope for being unclear :)
I would also suggest being open to different roles like matchmove , Rotopaint etc cause you can always move around once you get in
